title: Did Dianne Feinstein Get Her Husband’s Company a USPS Contract?
subtitle: Richard Blum, the husband of Senator Dianne Feinstein, obtained a contract to broker sales of USPS  facilities, but no evidence documents that it was due to his wife's influence.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Richard Blum, the husband of Senator Dianne Feinstein, obtained a contract to broker sales of USPS  facilities due to his wife's influence.
